channel.title: [562] How many players do you think this server can hold?
channel.description:
Currently running [562] Tkoscape. Main character files are loaded/saved via MYSQL from another VPS.
The title says it all. Here are the stats of my VPS.
6GB of RAM, Bursts up to 6512MB. 4 cores Currently running at a 800-950Mb/s Internet Connection. (Not lying...Literally running around 120MB/s connection.)
So, the question is, how many players could this server hold? Any guesses?

item.title: [562] How many players do you think this server can hold?

@Ags_Rush wrote:

I’ll take a look, mind looking at my spirit shield thread. I can use some help lol.

Read full topic

item.title: [562] How many players do you think this server can hold?
item.dc:creator: @Ags_Rush Ags Rush
item.description:
@Ags_Rush wrote:

I’m just gonna take a shot in the dark, i know nothing about vps’s or the average rate of players per 1gb storage. I’m going to say 500. Once again it is a shot in the dark.

item.title: [562] How many players do you think this server can hold?
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

What do you mean it doesn’t work? Worked fine for me. Just get rid of the limitations of connections per ip address if that is the issue. If you use RSA keys, then never mind. I’d say 1000 approx. Matters how well written your server is.

Read full topic
item.source: [562] How many players do you think this server can hold?

item.title: [562] How many players do you think this server can hold?
item.dc:creator: @zack_flowers zack_flowers
item.description:
@zack_flowers wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:4, topic:409859”]Why don’t you go check.
http://www.allgofree.org/blitzbot/[/quote]

Doesn’t work, it will immediately block the connections once passed a certain limit.[quote=“Ags Rush, post:2, topic:409859”]My mind is still processing 3 cpu’s with 6 gigs of ram.

Null.[/quote]

Haha, basically, I can set my VPS to have any statistics. Plus, scratch the 3 cores, upgraded it to 4.

Read full topic
